articles.title: iOS 16.4.1 (a): Apple's First iPhone Rapid Security Response Is Out - CNET
articles.description: What you need to know about the new type of update and how to download it.
articles.content: Apple released iOS 16.4.1 (a), the company's first iPhone Rapid Security Response update, on Monday. Apple said the update is recommended for all users and it applies important security fixes to iPho… [+1250 chars]

articles.title: AMD Ryzen Z1 APU series can operate with 9W TDP - VideoCardz.com
articles.description: AMD Ryzen Z1 APUs TDPs goes as low as 9W It is no secret that Ryzen Z1 and Ryzen 7040U series are similar. Both processor lines are using the same silicon codenamed Phoenix based on Zen4 and RDNA3 architecture, but there are small differences that make the Z1…
